snippet.title: [Gameplay] Legend of the Wargod
snippet.description:
'A story-driven turn-based RPG focused on strategy and survival. Explore and battle in a dark ancient fantasy world full of kings, honorbound soldiers, ruthless bandits, powerful wizards, terrible creatures, and deep arcane forces.'

Check the game on out itch.io or on indiedb.com.
You can also find it by googling 'Legend of the Wargod'.

The game will soon be available on Steam.

Stay tuned!
